game.name: Sniper Ultimate Assassin 2
game.description:
The super-exciting and action-packed challenge is back with more fun and thrill. Would you like to perform like a pro fighter once again in the sequel to Sniper Ultimate Assassin 2? If yes, join Sniper Ultimate Assassin 2 and be prepared to perform the worldâ€™s deadliest assassins once again. Do not take it easily as you need to handle the workload with a cool mind. A horde of dangerous criminals is everywhere in the city. You as a brave fighter need to eliminate them from the city. 
Put your fingers on your rifle and gear up to aim your target in this brand new action game! Let them shoot when you see them before they take any action against you. Your high power sniper rifle will never leave you alone so use it to complete multiple dangerous missions and become a world class elite sniper once again. Be careful and try to choose your target and aim carefully since you would have only bullet to use during each mission of this HTML5 shooting game!
There are multiple enemies to be faced off in several levels. Pay attention to the details and focus on the screen all the time to finish your mission as fast as possible! Complete missions successfully to earn points and use them to unlock new snipers before entering the advanced levels! Make sure that you do not shoot any innocent civilians otherwise people think you as the merciless killer. Get your job done wisely without making any mistakes! Check out other cool shooter challenges for free on atmegame.com in a search of extra fun and entertainment!
